nodes.text: A Human Male Mandalorian was a Mercenary working for the Sith Empire during the Battle of Corellia. On Corellia, he and group of other Mandalorians were hired to take down the Carth Onasi monument in Axial Park, killing several CorSec officers in the process.
He was later seen boasting his completed mission with his fellow Mandalorian mercenaries at the nearby Imperial base, saying the rounds were on him.
